name: @flemist/html-css-dev
description: Tool for fast develop web pages on html+css or postcss

scripts.start: node -e "require('./start.js')({ port: 3333, publicDir: 'public', inputDir: 'source', outputDir: 'public', filesPatterns: ['**'], map: true})"
scripts.build: node -e "require('./build.js')({ watch: false, inputDir: 'source', outputDir: 'public', filesPatterns: ['**'], map: true})"
scripts.watch: node -e "require('./build.js')({ watch: true, inputDir: 'source', outputDir: 'public', filesPatterns: ['**'], map: true})"

author: Nikolay Makhonin
